attributes.action: harmonise tax treatment of MPs' benefits to bring them in line with the general public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should be allowed to claim as many expenses as they like, subject to them being taxed like us ordinary folk, via P11Ds.  However, to discourage them from abusing the system, all expenses should be taxed at the new 50% rate (no exemptions).  And to solve the second home issue, they should also stay in a floating accommodation block moored on the Thames directly next to the Commons.  Their eco-friendly behaviour will be an example to us all.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
